title: Book Cover, "The Flowers of Friendship edited by Donald Gallup", 1954
signed: Signature printed vertically, lower center: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed in black and white ink, front cover right margin: THE/FLOWERS/OF/FRIENDSHIP/Letters/written to/Gertrude/Stein/EDITED BY DONALD GALLUP/Josaih Rice/George Santayana/William James/Pablo Picasso/Henri Matisse/Alfred Stieglitz/Mabel Dodge/Bernard Berenson/H.G. Wells/Carl Von Vechten/Juan Gris/Israel Sangwill/Leo Stein/Sherwood Anderson/Sylvia Beach/Jo Davidson/Ernest Hemingway/T.S. Eliot/and many others.

Printed vertically in white ink, side cover: THE FLOWERS OF FRIENDSHIP Letters to Gertrude Stein; printed horizontally: Borzoi/Books/Alfred A. Knopf.

Printed in white ink, back cover right margin: F. Scott Fitzgerald/Aaron Copland/Jean Cocteau/Edith Sitwell/Glenway Wescott/Thorton Wilder/Richard Wright/ Erik Satie/John Dewey/William Saroyan/Osbert Sitwell/Virgil Thomson/William Carlos Williams/are among those/whose Letters to/Gertrude Stein are/ included in/THE/FLOWERS/OF/FRIENDSHIP/Letters/written to/Gertrude/Stein.
provenance: Susan Lustig Peck; 2001: acquired by Museum
description: Book cover with photograph of Gertrude Stein and purple and black blocks.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "The Flowers of Friendship edited by Donald Gallup", 1954. Lithograph on thin glossy paper. Gift of Susan Lustig Peck. 2001-29-5.
